author: sky.cactus
content: Does anyone know of any projects that make it easy to give an ETH bounty to a GitHub project?  Something that makes it so the repository owner can claim the bounty, but it doesn't require manual coordination with the owner?  I'm OK with a trusted or semi-trusted solution.

author: sky.cactus
content: I want something where I can drop a bounty amount + link to details in a GitHub issue as a way of saying, "I pledge X ETH if you fix this bug" and ideally the bounty system provides the GitHub app author with details on how they can claim the bounty.

author: sky.cactus
content: This would be for GitHub repositories where I generally trust the authors to not frivolously claim the bounty, so doesn't need any security beyond some mechanism that allows the GitHub repository owner to claim it but not random issue followers.
